TopicTitle: Not able to control from docking port

Articles.Content:
Hi,

At the moment I'm trying to add my first module to my space station but I hit a problem. When trying to contol from my docking port, I't won't simply do it and as a result the docking won't work (The space station port won't connect to the ships docking port. Can anyone help me please? Thanks a lot!

Royal Qube
You don't have to hit "Control from Here" on the docking port to make it dock. This is a bug where the docking magnetism won't engage. Take a look here.
Thank you! after modifying some parts, relaunching the station and the module it worked! Thanks for the info!
